entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Params keyword with JSImport #96112
  • Mixed Assembly Loading in .NET #96110

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: aot export api stdcall,UnmanagedCallersOnly for vb6 #96103
  • [NativeAOT] Properly implement targeting iOS-like platforms rather than pretending to be macOS #87610
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Use lowercase arm64 in CMakePresets.json #96111
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add non generic overload for retrieving keyed services #96109
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] Gshared mrgctx #96108
    NO-REVIEW
  • Simplify AdditionalSharedFrameworkToInstallArguments in workloads-testing.targets #96107
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][jit] Avoid creating rgctx trampolines to call gshared methods … #96104
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Merged

  • [RISC-V] Fix the order of parameters stored on the stack #96106
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Rename IsOSXLike to IsApplePlatform in libraries #96098
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Rename IsMacOS to IsApplePlatform in the JIT #96090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAot: Remove never-defined FEATURE_RWX_MEMORY #96100
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • extract side-effects from op1 of GT_COMMA #96077
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_ALWAYS fall-through check in Compiler::fgFindInsertPoint #96070
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix passing of valuetypes with a non-8 byte aligned size on arm64+ios/macos. #96079
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] introduce JSProxyContext #95959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
